PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-09632017-06-22FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActPooled Registered Pension Plans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pension Benefits Standards Regulations, 1985 and the Pooled Registered Pension Plans Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PENSION BENEFITS STANDARDS REGULATIONS, 1985 AND THE POOLED REGISTERED PENSION PLANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) further ease the burden of solvency deficit payments on the sponsors of federally regulated defined benefit plans and improve the long-term sustainability of defined benefit plans by increasing the limits on letters of credit and solvency payment reductions from 15 per cent of assets to 15 per cent of liabilities; and (2) address inconsistencies between the French and English versions of the Pension Benefits Standards Regulations, 1985 and the Pooled Registered Pension Plans Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0145 Publication Date: 2017-07-12
AttachmentsAttachment
